>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/me"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get detailed profile information about the current user (including the current user's username).

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-read-private**, **user-read-email**

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
